alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 1:41AM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 65 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
